mapper.insert: insert into user_general (user_id, user_name, login_id, `password`, salt, famname, famname_kana, givename, givename_kana, fullname, fullname_kana, gender, birthday, email, tel, postcode, addr1, addr2, addr3, judicial_id, law_group_id, `status`, create_time, update_time, avatar) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{famname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{famnameKana,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{givename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{givenameKana,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullnameKana,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{judicialId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lawGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{avatar,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY})
